summary: Utrecht is the fourth-largest city in the Netherlands and the capital of Utrecht province. Located in the center of the country, it has a rich history dating back to the Middle Ages and is known for its beautiful old buildings. Utrecht was once the most important city in the Netherlands, but Amsterdam took over during the Dutch Golden Age. Today, it's a major transportation hub with a large university and many cultural events. It's also recognized as one of the world's top unsung places to visit.
title: Utrecht
